#include <iostream>
//#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	long long int t,n,a,b,c;
	cin>>t;
//	scanf("%lld",&t);
	for(long long int i=0;i<t;i++){
	   cin>>n;
	   cin>>a;
	   cin>>b>>c;
	  // double f;
	   int cnt=0;
	   long int g;
	   double mul,mul2;
	   mul=(c*10)+(b*100)+(a*1000);
	   for(int j=9;j>0;j--){
	       for(int k=9;k>=0;k--){
	           mul2=mul+k+(j*10000);
	           double f=mul2/n;
	           //cout<<f<<endl;
	           g=floor(f);
	           //cout<<f<<" "<<g<<" "<<mul2<<" ";
	           if(f==g){
	             cnt++;
	             cout<<j<<" "<<k<<" "<<f<<endl;
	             break;
	           }
	       }
	       if(cnt==1)
	       break;
	   }
	   if(cnt==0)
	   cout<<"0"<<endl;
	   //scanf("%lld",&n);
	   }
	return 0;
}
